lore.block.aether_unity.aether_mud: A squelchy soil comprised of Aether Dirt. These can be smelted into Packed Aether Mud, which can be used to make some nice decorative bricks!
lore.block.aether_unity.aether_mud_brick: Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Walls can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Bricks made from Packed Aether Mud. These can be used as a building block!
lore.block.aether_unity.ambrosium_campfi: A campfire made of Ambrosium. You can use this to cook meat, as a signal, or as a light source!
lore.block.aether_unity.coarse_aether_di: The coarse variation of Aether Dirt.
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_block: The Aether's native moss species. This can be grown with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_carpet: A thin, blanket-like layer of Flutemoss. This is produced when growing Flutemoss with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.golden_oak_leaf_: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
lore.block.aether_unity.packed_aether_mu: The hardened variant of Aether Mud. These can be used as a building block, or they can be turned into decorative bricks!
lore.block.aether_unity.short_aether_gra: Blades of the Aether's grass. They feel slightly cool to the touch.
lore.block.aether_unity.skyfern: The Aether's local fern plant. These have soft, silky leaves.
lore.block.aether_unity.skyroot_leaf_pil: A pile of Skyroot Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_brick_s: Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_brick_w: Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Walls can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_bricks: The result from smelting Valkyrie Clay after crafting it together. These pristine bricks make for a nice building material that can crafted into several variants.
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_clay: The Aether's native clay. This is occasionally found in lakes.
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_tile_sl: Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_tile_st: Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_tile_wa: Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Walls can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_unity.valkyrie_tiles: A variant of Valkyrie Bricks that works nicely as a shiny floor block.
lore.item.aether_unity.valkyrie_brick: A shiny white brick that can be crafted into various different decoration blocks, such as Valkyrie Bricks.
lore.item.aether_unity.valkyrie_clay_bal: Obtained from mining Valkyrie Clay. This moldable lump of clay can either be smelted into a Valkyrie Brick or crafted back into a block.
pack.aether_unity.asset_overrides.title: The Aether: Unity Asset Overrides
